dcterms:creator: Ozan Unal

dcterms:description: ScribbleKITTI provides realistic weak labels for LiDAR semantic segmentation in the form of scribbles, allowing for significant reduction in labeling time.
dcterms:title: ScribbleKITTI

dcterms:creator: Jens Behley

dcterms:description: SemanticKITTI is the most popular large-scale outdoor-scene dataset for LiDAR semantic segmentation, providing dense annotations for various classes.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI

dcterms:creator: Stephan R Richter
Vibhav Vineet

dcterms:description: GTA-V is a synthetic dataset containing 24,966 images with pixel-level semantic annotations, generated using a modified version of the video game Grand Theft Auto 5.
dcterms:title: GTA-V

dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Christoph Stiller
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: KITTI is a dataset that combines vision and robotics, providing a benchmark for various tasks including 3D object detection and semantic segmentation.
dcterms:title: KITTI
